overview.title: Company Overview
overview.description: CATL New Energy Technologies Co., Ltd. is a global leading new energy innovation technology company, dedicated to providing top-tier solutions and services for global new energy applications.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To provide innovative battery solutions for global customers.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the global leading battery manufacturer.

global.title: Global Layout
global.description: CATL has established a complete R&D, manufacturing, sales, and service network globally.

manufacturing.title: Global Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Established production bases in China, Germany, Hungary, etc., achieving a global layout.

rd.title: Research Centers
rd.description: Set up multiple research centers globally, gathering top talents to promote technological innovation.

sales.title: Sales Network
sales.description: Products are exported globally, providing power battery solutions for many well-known automobile manufacturers.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: Pursuing excellent quality, building premium projects.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Development
sustainability.description: Practicing green development, jointly building a better future.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Looking forward to communicating with you

value.title: Let Time Witness Value
value.desc: Through hardware-software integration black tech innovation and internal-nourishment external-protection material mechanism, CATL achieves longer battery life and superior long-term performance, bringing higher economic benefits.

reliability.title: Reliability Conveys Peace of Mind
reliability.desc: Five layers of reliability assurance from design, testing, materials to production processes and processing flows ensure that every battery is safe and durable.

adaptability.title: All-round Adaptability
adaptability.desc: Whether it's high temperature, low cold or rainwater intrusion, CATL can provide you with comprehensive protection.

service.title: Service Exceeds Expectations
service.desc: With rapid response standards and a global after-sales network, we provide users with high-quality after-sales services.

intelligence.title: Intelligence Insights Every Detail
intelligence.desc: Interconnected intelligent battery management systems (BMS) make batteries safer, systems more efficient, and travel more secure.

roadPassenger.title: Road Passenger Transport Solutions
roadPassenger.desc: CATL provides safe, reliable, and durable scenario-based solutions for road passenger transport characterized by frequent use and high stability requirements.

cityDelivery.title: Urban Delivery Solutions
cityDelivery.desc: CATL power batteries are compatible with light trucks, light buses, micro trucks, and mini vans, widely used in express delivery, supermarket distribution, fresh produce, and other scenarios.

heavyDuty.title: Heavy Haulage Solutions
heavyDuty.desc: CATL provides powerful clean energy for heavy haulage vehicles, meeting the requirements of various working conditions such as mining areas, ports, urban short-distance transportation, and construction engineering.

roadCleaning.title: Urban Road Cleaning Solutions
roadCleaning.desc: CATL provides customized solutions according to different road cleaning vehicle needs. The battery products have high safety, long life, and strong environmental adaptability.

construction.title: Construction Machinery Solutions
construction.desc: CATL provides safe, reliable, and durable battery product solutions for construction machinery based on the characteristics of complex working conditions in mining areas and ports.

twoWheeler.title: Two-wheeler Solutions
twoWheeler.desc: CATL provides green, intelligent, and safe solutions for two-wheelers, applied in commuting, food delivery, courier services, and other scenarios.

marine.title: Marine Solutions
marine.desc: CATL provides safe, reliable, and environmentally friendly solutions for marine electrification, promoting the construction of ecological civilization in water areas.

special.title: Special Application Solutions
special.desc: CATL safeguards the electrified development of airport parks and port terminals, providing green, clean, and reliable product solutions.

hero.title: CP-101 Solid Gold Pill
hero.subtitle: Forever 20: Activate Vascular Health
hero.desc: Japanese plant extracts × Microcirculation activation technology, precisely repairing blood vessels and hormone systems, improving fatigue, low energy, cold sensitivity, and other common male issues. Golden formula supports male physical strength, immunity, and sex hormones, gentle conditioning, effective in the long term.

agaricus.title: Agaricus Subcritical Water Extract CP-101
agaricus.desc: Using subcritical extraction technology to retain the complete polysaccharide activity, enhancing the immune system, suitable for auxiliary protection against prostate cancer.

longpepper.title: Long Pepper Extract
longpepper.desc: Activates Tie2 receptors in blood vessels, improves microcirculation, enhances blood flow dynamics, effectively improving peripheral circulation problems.

male.title: Improves Male Sexual Function and Energy State
male.desc: Boosts energy, improves sexual function, enhances confidence.

kidney.title: Regulates Kidney Function, Relieves Fatigue and Weakness
kidney.desc: Treats kidneys, relieves fatigue, restores vitality.

immune.title: Strengthens Immune System
immune.desc: Enhances immunity, improves body defense capabilities.

prostate.title: Improves Prostate Health and Hormone Status

dosage.title: Daily Recommended Dosage
dosage.desc: 1-2 capsules daily, best taken after meals. Adjust based on personal condition, do not exceed recommended dosage.

target.title: Recommended Groups
list: Men frequently experiencing fatigue and declining energy
People with cold hands and feet, prone to swelling
Sub-healthy, middle-aged men transitioning to weaker states
Long-term high-pressure workers requiring sustained energy support
